page1.title: Welcome to ice
page1.description: [[:ice]] is a digital currency that you can earn with your phone. ice is owned and operated by every day users like yourself.

page2.title: Planet Friendly
page2.description: [[:ice]] is inherently more energy efficient than BTC as it uses a “Proof of Stake” consensus mechanism. With proof-of-stake (POS), cryptocurrency owners validate block transactions based on the number of coins a validator stakes.

page3.title: People’s Coin
page3.description_part1: The power is in your hands.
page3.description_part2: Everything that we develop at [[:ice]] will be open source & controlled by the Decentralized Autonomous Organization (DAO).

page4.title: Stay Connected
page4.description: Tap [[:iceLogo]] for your daily check-in with our free, energy-light mobile app. Your daily tap ensures that ice ends up in the hands of real humans, not bots.

page5.title: Refer & Earn
page5.description: Invite your friends and earn (both of you) up to 25% bonus on your base earning rate for each friend that joins your team.

page6.title: Notifications
page6.description_part1: [[:ice]] check-in sessions only last for 24 hours. Would you like to receive a notification when your current session ends?
page6.description_part2: Don’t worry, we will not spam you!

invite_friend.title: Invite Friends
invite_friend.description: Earn extra [[:ice]] by inviting your friends.

empty.title: You currently don't have any [[:title]] referrals!
empty.contacts: You currently don't have any contacts in the phonebook.

contacts.empty_description: Sync your contacts and see who is already on [[:ice]]. In the future, you will be able to send ice to any of your contacts.

confirm_code.title: Confirm Code
confirm_code.description: Please enter the confirmation code you have received on your phone.

confirm_phone.title: Confirm Phone
confirm_phone.description: Please confirm your country code and enter your phone number.

contacts_list.invitation_text: Hi {{name}}, I would like to invite you to join ice.

signIn.privacy: By continuing, you agree to our [[:link]]Terms of Service[[/:link]] and [[:link]]Privacy Policy[[/:link]]

claimUsername.title: Claim nickname
claimUsername.description: Your friends will need to use this nickname to join your team.
claimUsername.note_part1: When creating a nickname, use only letters, numbers, and periods.

whoInvitedYou.title: Who invited you?
whoInvitedYou.description: Enter the nickname of the person who invited you.
whoInvitedYou.dontHaveInvitationCode: By completing this step, you and your friend will receive a 25% bonus on the base earning rate when you are both checking-in at the same time.
whoInvitedYou.dontHaveCodeTip: If you don't have an invitation code we will select a random member as your referral!

errors.multiple_accounts: Email/phone number is associated with another account. Please log into that account to prove ownership, then logout and log back into this one. If you do not own that other account or are unable to log into it, please contact our support.
errors.wrong_phone_number: Invalid phone number, please try again.
errors.invalid_validation_code: Invalid code number, please try again!
errors.expired_action_code: OTP in email link has expired.
errors.account_exists_with_different_credential: There already exists an account with the email address asserted by the credential.
errors.invalid_credential: The credentials are malformed or have expired.
errors.operation_not_allowed: The type of account corresponding to the credentials is not enabled.
errors.user_not_found_for_email: There is no user corresponding to the given email.
errors.google_play_services_not_available: Google Play services are not available on this device.
errors.no_such_provider: You do not have this provider linked.
errors.code_expired: The code has expired, please ask for a new code.
errors.too_many_requests: Too many requests, please try again later.
errors.network_error_message: Your device does not have any active internet connection.
errors.unknown_error: An error occurred, please try again later.
errors.general_error_message: Looks like something went wrong. Our team is working on fixing it right now.
errors.general_network_error: A network error has occurred, please check your connection.
errors.credential_already_in_use: These credentials are already associated with a different user account.
errors.email_already_in_use: The email address is already in use by another account.
errors.user_token_expired: Your credentials are no longer valid, please sign in again.
errors.requires_recent_login: This operation is sensitive and requires recent authentication. Please sign in again.
errors.same_email: You can’t use the same e-mail.

profile.invite_friends_engage: Spread the word and invite your friends. The more referrals, the more you’ll earn!

not_found.title: User was not found
not_found.description: Oops, we couldn't find this user.

pioneer.description: Refer more users and earn more [[:ice]].

referrals.title: REFERRALS
referrals.description: Referral stats for the previous 5 days.
referrals.no_referrals_description: You don't have any referrals yet.

tasks.title: Your progress
tasks.description: Complete the tasks below and level up!

completed.title: Congratulations
completed.description: Keep checking-in daily to earn extra rewards!

popup.title: Join our Telegram channel
popup.description: Specify your nickname that is used on Telegram.

claim_username.title: Claim your nickname
claim_username.description: Set it and share it with your friends.

join_telegram.title: Join Telegram
join_telegram.description: Be part of our community and join now.

follow_us_on_twitter.title: Follow us on Twitter
follow_us_on_twitter.description: Let’s keep in touch, follow us on Twitter.

invite_friends.title: Invite 5 Friends
invite_friends.description: Grow your team and increase your earnings.

engagement.title: ENGAGEMENT
engagement.description_part1: Streak refers to how many consecutive days you have checked-in.
engagement.description_part2: For each 6 consecutive days you receive one day off.

settings.title: Settings
settings.invite_description: Earn extra ice by inviting your friends.
settings.delete_confirmation_title: Are you sure you want to remove the account?
settings.logout_description: Sign off and take a break.
settings.logout_confirmation_title: Are you sure you want to sign off?

confirm_phone.title: Confirm New Phone
confirm_phone.description: Please confirm your country code and enter your new phone number.

notifications.enable_prompt: Notifications are not allowed. Do you want to enable them?
notifications.disable_notifications_description: By disabling notifications you will not be able to receive updates when you can start checking-in, news or team information.

promotions.title: Promotions
promotions.description: Receive notifications on how to grow your team and earn more.

daily_bonus.title: Daily bonus
daily_bonus.description: Receive notifications to claim your daily bonus.

mining.title: Session status
mining.description: Receive notifications about your check-in activity.

system.title: System
system.description: Receive important notifications about the ice app.

change_lang_confirm.title: Change language
change_lang_confirm.prompt: Applying this setting will restart the app.

settings.update_email_confirmation_subtitle: Changing your email address will require you to re-login. Are you sure you want to proceed?
settings.unlink_logins_description: You can unlink your logins from here.

invite_share.title: Invite a friend
invite_share.share_message: Hi ☃️ Snowman! Join my team on ice and receive 10 ice coins when you sign-up using my referral code:
invite_share.description: Spread the word and invite your friends. You earn [[:ice]] for each new referral you bring.

staking.benefits_description: Pre-stake your ice rewards for up to 5 years and increase your earning rate by up to 250%.
staking.title: Pre-Staking
staking.description: Staking is a process that involves committing your crypto assets to support a blockchain network and confirm transactions.
staking.terms_agree: I agree to the [[:ice]] [[:link]]Staking Terms[[/:link]]. Your ice holdings will be locked for the selected period.
staking.confirm_subtitle: Are you sure you want to pre-stake your coins? This cannot be undone once you confirm.

update_required.title: Please Update
update_required.description: You are using an old app version and need to update it in order to use it further.

news.no_more_news: this is the last entry of the news feed.

search.empty: Search for contacts, ice friends and members of your micro-community.
search.nothing_is_found: Nothing was found for your query.

tabbar.mining_inactive_tooltip: Tap here to start your first check-in session.
tabbar.mining_reset_tooltip: Press for 1 second to extend your check-in session.
tabbar.mining_holiday_reset_tooltip: You are using a Day Off! Press for 1 second to extend your check-in session.
tabbar.mining_holiday_active: You are using a Day Off!

invite_friend.description: Your friend is not yet on [[:ice]]. Send him an invitation!

balance_history.title: Balance History
balance_history.list_end_label: this is the last entry of the balance history.
balance_history.no_data: There is no data to display for the specified period.

pop_up.update_now_text: You are using an old app version and need to update it in order to use it further.
pop_up.up_to_date_text: You are now using the latest version. Check all the changes below.
pop_up.resurrection_message: You have a one time chance to resurrect and receive [[:amount]] coins you have lost in the past [[:period]].
pop_up.resurrection_warning: You can only resurrect one time!
pop_up.resurrection_no_confirm_message: You will lose your [[:amount]] coins forever. Are you sure you want to continue?
pop_up.resurrection_yes_confirm_message: You can only resurrect one time! Are you sure you want to continue? The [[:amount]] coins will return to your balance within the next hour.
pop_up.delete_account_confirmation_text: Deleting your account will permanently erase all your data, including your ice balance. Do you want to proceed?

notifications.multiply: and {{count}} others have joined your team.
notifications.add_both: Add mocked notifications and announcements together
notifications.title: Notifications

step1.title: 1. Your Profile Statistics
step1.description: Tap on the blocks you want to hide from public eyes.

step2.description: Tap on this block to hide it from public eyes.
step2.title: 2. Your Current Role

step3.title: 3. Your Earned Badges
step3.description: Tap here to hide your badges from public eyes.

confirm_email.title: Confirm your email
confirm_email.description: Please enter your email address and we will send the code.
confirm_email.note: If you didn’t receive the email within 5 minutes, please check your spam folder.
confirm_email.emailed_link_to: We emailed a magic link to
confirm_email.link_instruction: Click the link to log in or sign up.
confirm_email.modify_description: Please enter your new email address.

invalid_link.title: Invalid link
invalid_link.description: Unfortunately, this link is invalid, please enter your email again and we will send you a new link.

confirm_code.title: Confirm code
confirm_code.description: Please enter the code sent to

ice_bonus.title: Welcome reward
ice_bonus.description: Congratulations, you have received your first [[:value]] [[:ice]] coins which proves our [[:bold]]Trust[[/:bold]] in [[:bold]]You[[/:bold]].

snowman.title: Snowman
snowman.subtitle: Build a snow empire
snowman.description: Earn by checking in every 24 hours to show your commitment to the ice network and prove that you're a human, not a robot.

ambassador.title: Ambassador
ambassador.subtitle: Ruler of the snow empire
ambassador.description: You become an ambassador when at least 100 people joined your team. Every ambassador will get early access to new features.

confirm_phone.modify_description: Please confirm your country code and enter your phone number.
confirm_phone.same_phone_error: You can’t use the same number.

readmore.title: Read more
readmore.description: Here you can see our latest news from our team. Tap on this button to read the full article.

releasednews.title: Released news
releasednews.description: Tap on each individual news title and read the full version of it. Stay up to date on all our news and polls.

allow_contacts.title: Allow contacts
allow_contacts.description: Sync your contacts and see who is already on [[:ice]]. In the future you will be able to send [[:ice]] to any of your contacts.

confirm_phone.title: Confirm phone
confirm_phone.description: Confirm your identity and allow your contacts to know that you are also a member of the ice network. Your phone number will not be shared with other third parties.

contacts_list.title: List of contacts
contacts_list.description: This is the list with all your contacts, those who already joined the [[:ice]] network being displayed on top of the list.

referrals.title: Referrals
referrals.description: Here you will see how many referrals you have in total. The more people you invite, the more you will earn.

earnings.title: Earnings
earnings.description: Your current balance is updated every hour and displayed here. It includes your direct & staked earnings together with the Tier 1 and Tier 2 earnings.

segmented_control_tier_one.title: Tier 1
segmented_control_tier_one.description: Here you can see the list of your Tier 1 referrals. For each friend checking-in at the same time with you, you will get extra 25% on your base current adoption earning rate. [[:link]]Read more[[/:link]]

segmented_control_tier_two.title: Tier 2
segmented_control_tier_two.description: Here you can see the list of your Tier 2 referrals. For each friend checking-in at the same time with you, you will get extra 5% on your base current adoption earning rate. [[:link]]Read more[[/:link]]

active_users.title: Active Users
active_users.description: This is the current status of your referrals check-in activity. They count as active when they have an active check-in session.

tier_one_earnings.title: Tier 1 Earnings
tier_one_earnings.description: Here you can see the list of your Tier 1 referrals. For each member checking-in at the same time with you, you will both get extra 25% on your base current adoption earning rate.

ping.title: Ping Button
ping.description: Notify your referrals to start their check-in sessions. You can send one notification to each referral every 24h.

home.title: Home
home.description: Welcome to [[:ice]]. On the home screen you can find all the statistics about your balance, the current earning rate, your global rank along with your team.

invite.title: Invite
invite.description: For every person that you invite, you will both earn up to 25% on your base earning rate. The more people you invite, the more you will earn.

team.title: Team
team.description: [[:ice]] is better with friends. On this page you can see the status of your team members from both Tier 1 and Tier 2 levels. You can also ping them from here.

news.title: News
news.description: Stay up to date on all our news and polls. As we are a Decentralized Autonomous Organization, you will be able to vote here for the future features.

profile.title: Profile
profile.description: Customize your profile details and see all your achievements and badges that you have earned. Use the calculator from here, so you can estimate your earnings.

earningicestart.title: Earning ice
earningicestart.description: You can start the [[:ice]] check-in session every 24 hours by tapping this button. Don’t forget to come back each day and start earning!

earningiceseemore.title: Earning ice
earningiceseemore.description: Tap again and see more details about your current check-in session.

stats.title: Stats
stats.description: On the stats page you can see Total and Active users that checked-in each day along with Top countries and users.

help.title: Help
help.description: Do you have any questions? Check out our list of frequently asked questions. If you can't find what you're looking for, don't hesitate to reach out to us at hi@ice.io.

preStaking.title: Pre-Staking
preStaking.description: Maximize your returns by pre-staking your earning rewards. Select your allocation and staking period to receive a bonus on top of your earnings.

wallet.title: Wallet Card
wallet.description: You can find here your current [[:ice]] balance, together with the earning rate. The more referrals from your team are online, the higher the earning rate.

earning.title: Earning Card
earning.description: Stay up to date on your earning rate and bonuses! Here you can check out your current rate, our base rate, and bonus rates for various activities in the app.

engagement.title: Engagement Card
engagement.description: Keep track of your check-in sessions streak and days off! Check this section for more details about your consecutive check-in sessions and to see how many available days off you have.

profilecard.title: Profile Card
profilecard.description: You can keep track of your profile status by following this card. It displays your current global rank, together with your role, level and total referrals.

referralscard.title: Referral Card
referralscard.description: See the evolution of your referral stats for the previous 5 days for both Tier 1 and Tier 2 referrals by tapping this card.

adoptioncard.title: Adoption Card
adoptioncard.description: Based on the average of the last week total of active Snowmen, you can see the current [[:ice]] earning rate. The earning rate is halved when reached the next threshold.

nickname.title: Nickname
nickname.description: The nickname is what makes you unique. Your friends will need to use it in order to join your team. You can also use this shortcut to open your profile.

balancehistory.title: Balance History
balancehistory.description: You can find here your current [[:ice]] balance on local wallet and blockchain. The local wallet balance is updated every hour, while the blockchain balance is updated every 24 hours.

achievements.title: Achievements
achievements.description: Complete the tasks below and level up! Start your first check-in session now!

unlinkLogin.title: Unlink Login?
unlinkLogin.message: Are you sure you want to unlink the login via {{providerName}} from this device?

endSession.title: End Session?
endSession.message: Are you sure you want to end the {{providerName}} login session from this device?

extra_bonus.claim_message: It’s time for your today’s bonus, please tap on the [[:bold]]“Claim Bonus”[[/:bold]] button bellow.
extra_bonus.extra_message: You have received your daily extra bonus on your earning rate.
extra_bonus.expired_message: Unfortunately, today's bonus has expired. Stay tuned for the next notification!

early_access.title: Early Access
early_access.message_part1: Get a sneak peek of the [[:bold]]ice[[/:bold]] app before our [[:bold]]upcoming official release.[[/:bold]]
early_access.message_part2: All balances will be reset to 0 on the release date. Your team, however, will stay intact.
early_access.checkbox_description: I’ve acknowledged! Don’t show this pop-up again.

mining_notice.title: Notice
mining_notice.message: Thanks for your interest in earning [[:bold]]ice![[/:bold]] We are currently fine-tuning our technology and check-in isn't available at the moment. This is your chance to focus on building your team and growing your micro-community.
mining_notice.message_footer: Stay tuned for updates on our [[:twitter]]Twitter[[/:twitter]] and [[:telegram]]Telegram[[/:telegram]] channels.

qr_code.description: Scan QR code to join my team.

tiktok.title: Join us on TikTok
tiktok.description: We just wanted to reach out and let you know about our exciting new community on TikTok. We're sharing fun and informative content about our digital currency, ice, and we would love for you to join us!

youtube.title: Join us on YouTube
youtube.description: From tutorials on how to earn ice, to updates about new features, and even fun community content, our YouTube channel is the perfect place to stay up-to-date.

linkedin.title: Join us on LinkedIn
linkedin.description: Joining the ice community on LinkedIn is a great way to stay informed about the latest developments and to connect with like-minded individuals who are just as passionate about the future of digital currencies as you are.

facebook.title: Join us on Facebook
facebook.description_part1: We highly recommend giving our Facebook page a follow.
facebook.description_part2: Not only will it help you stay up to date on everything that’s happening with the ice project, but it’s also a great way to connect with our community and be a part of the conversation.

instagram.title: Join us on Instagram
instagram.description_part1: Following us on Instagram is a great way to stay in the loop and connect with other users who are also passionate about ice
instagram.description_part2: Plus, you'll be the first to know about any new features or promotions that we're launching.
